purpose: The email invites researchers and practitioners to submit original papers for the ICITS'26 conference.
evidence_sentences: ICITS'26 - 9th International Conference on Information Technology & Systems, to be held at Universidad Tecnológica de Honduras, Roatán Island, Honduras, between the 16th and the 18th of February 2026, is an international forum for researchers and practitioners to present and discuss the most recent innovations, trends, results, experiences and concerns in the several perspectives of Information Technology & Systems.
We are pleased to invite you to submit your original papers to ICITS'26.
All submissions will be reviewed on the basis of relevance, originality, importance and clarity.
